desc: Compares the content of the currently active file with the content in the clipboard.
Changes the language mode of the currently active editor in VS Code.
Formats the code in the currently selected text range according to the code formatting settings.
Navigates forward in the history of editors and files opened in VS Code.
Navigates to the last location in the editor's history.
Opens a prompt to navigate to a specific line and, optionally, column in the current file.
Navigates to the top-most code hover tooltip in the editor.
Moves the hover widget to the bottom of the editor viewport.
Opens the find widget to search within the editor or an open file when the editor has focus.
Transforms the selected text to uppercase in the editor.
Transforms the selected text to lowercase in the editor.
Transforms the selected text to snake_case.
Transforms the selected text to camelCase format.
Transforms the selected text to PascalCase, capitalizing the first letter of each word and removing spaces.
Transforms the selected text to Title Case, capitalizing the first letter of each word.
Transforms the selected text to kebab-case, where all letters are lowercase and words are separated by hyphens.
